snippet: Donald had to dodge a charging baboon before grabbing the lead at the Nedbank Challenge in Sun City, South Africa.
abstract: Luke Donald takes second-round lead at Nedbank Challenge golf tournament in Sun City, South Africa; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Donald had to dodge a charging baboon before grabbing the lead at the Nedbank Challenge in Sun City, South Africa.

headline.main: Luke Donald Leads in Sun City
